citations.desc: ACCESS AND INSPECTION OF RECORDS AND PROPERTY; SUBMISSION OF ITINERARIES.
citations.narrative:
A responsible adult was not available to accompany APHIS Officials during the inspection process at 1:00 to 1:30
pm on 14-FEB-17.
Call to Cellular phones licensees working could not come for the inspection.
